text:
1. Sushmita Sen Confirms Relationship With 27-Year-Old Rohman Shawl, Says 'Not Getting Married Yet'
After dating Randeep Hooda and Ricky Martin in the past, Sushmita Sen is now dating 27-year-old model Rohman Shawl. From sharing lots of pictures to making public appearances with him, she has finally confessed that she is in love but is “not getting married yet”.
2. Twinkle Khanna Takes A Dig At Building Of Tall Statues & Ignoring Air Quality Index In Her Blog
"The World Health Organisation reports that 14 of the world’s most polluted cities are in our country, with Kanpur topping the list. Our focus though seems to be on renaming cities and building towering statues. But I suppose, if playing statue-statue is the name of the game then we may as well spend another few hundred crore to ensure that the world’s tallest statues are made a tad more relevant by having the world’s biggest anti-pollution masks sitting jauntily on their noses."
3. Nick Jonas Is Having A Ball At His Bachelor’s Party & Priyanka Chopra Is Lovestruck Over His Sexy Avatar
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
And now, it’s time for Nick Jonas Bachelor’s party. Nick Jonas has revealed some of the pictures from his own bachelor party in different yet sexy avatars that have left Priyanka Chopra lovestruck. Take a look!
4. Aamir Khan’s Rs 1000 Cr Mahabharata Will Be A 7-Part Series & He’ll Reportedly Play Lord Krishna
What’s more? Revealing more information, a source close to the project told Bollywood Hungama that it will be a seven-part web-series. Aamir Khan will reportedly play the role of Lord Krishna in the magnum opus. Each series will have a different director, the report stated.
5. Here's The Unboxing Clip Of Isha Ambani-Anand Piramal's Royal Wedding Invite Worth Rs 3 Lakh!
Now, another video revealing the complete wedding card has surfaced on social media showing this expensive piece, which is sure a treat to the eyes.
title: Sushmita Sen Confirms Dating Rohman Shawl, Twinkle Khanna Takes Dig At Statues & More From Ent
description: From Sushmita Sen confirming relationship with 27 year old model Rohman Shawl to Twinkle Khanna taking a dig at building of tall statues amid declining air quality index, here’s all that rocked the world of entertainment. After dating Randeep Hooda and Ricky Martin in the past, Sushmita Sen is now dating 27-year-old model Rohman Shawl.
